definition: of or relating to or completing a period of 200 years, the 200th anniversary (or the celebration of it)
details:
adjective
- of or relating to or completing a period of 200 years
= example: of or relating to or completing a period of 200 years
= synonyms: bicentenary
noun
- the 200th anniversary (or the celebration of it)
= synonyms: bicentenary
